ghBot Release Notes

Current version: Beta 1.82

Improvements and additions:
* New feature for ghBot! - You can now generate errors with ghBot using FairPlay137 and Atom Smasher's web-based Error Generators. For the command and parameters required to generate errors, type "gh!errorgenhelp".
* Supported themes for the error generator: Windows XP, Windows 9x era (95/98) and Windows 10
* The latency no longer holds decimal values. The latency is now in an integer form.
* Fixed some bugs where sometimes, the text document generated by the user won't upload at all.
